H0.text: Buddy Holly and the Big Bopper were two of the three musicians who died in a plane crash in February 1959. Who was the other one. Eddie Cochran

H1.text: Buddy Holly and the Big Bopper were two of the three musicians who died in a plane crash in February 1959. Who was the other one. Jerry Lee Lewis

H2.text: Buddy Holly and the Big Bopper were two of the three musicians who died in a plane crash in February 1959. Who was the other one. Chuck Berry

H3.text: Buddy Holly and the Big Bopper were two of the three musicians who died in a plane crash in February 1959. Who was the other one. Richie Valens

A4.text: Valens died in a plane crash in Iowa, an accident that also claimed the lives of fellow musicians Buddy Holly and J. P. 'The Big Bopper' Richardson
